Articles.Content:
hi,

yesterday i tried the Asteroid redirect scenario, part 2

the thing is, when i was reentering kerbin with the asteroid things just overheated and blew up

i know that scenario was designed for pre-release so it may be in need of some rework for the new thermal and drag effects.

anyway i would like to ask if any of you could try it out and check if it's just me noobing arround or my question may have a little bit of reason
Glad you even arrived there. When I did the part 1, the transfer vessel`s fuel tanks just exploded from overheating after only two minutes of LV-N burning.
